snippet.title: Velistra: Failed State - Prototype Trailer | Indie Political Strategy Game
snippet.description:
Wishlist Velistra: Failed State on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3599640/Velistra_Failed_State/?utm_source=youtube&utm_content=trailer_p

Welcome to Velistra: Failed State - a darkly satirical indie political strategy game where your every decision shapes a nation's destiny. In this official trailer, experience the tension of leading a country on the brink of collapse. Will you guide your nation to stability, or let chaos reign?

Key Features:
• Indie Game | Political Strategy | Dark Satire
• Navigate politics, diplomacy, and survival
• Make high-stakes decisions in a crumbling state

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@VoltekPlay
Twitter: https://x.com/VoltekPlay
Itch: https://voltekplay.itch.io/
